name.en: Independent Study: The Neural Mechanisms of Inhibitory Control
name.ch: 獨立研究：衝動抑制歷程的神經機制

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “The independent study course will discuss the current research issues of impulsive behaviors and the neural mechanisms of inhibitory control. I hope students could get theory knowledge on these issues and know the research development in this course, and then apply to their experiments and research.“
goal.ch: 專題探討衝動控制與神經機制相關之認知神經科學研究議題，期望透過課程內容讓學生獲得更深入的了解，以充份發揮及應用到實際實驗與研究中。

content.en: The independent study course will discuss the current research issues of impulsive behaviors and the neural mechanisms of inhibitory control. Students who want to take this course need to have solid backgrounds in cognitive neuroscience and experimental psychology.
content.ch: 探討衝動行為與抑制控制之神經機制的研究議題。選修本門課的同學必須具備認知神經科學與實驗室心理學的研修知識背景。

textbook.en:
“Inhibition in Cognition by Gorfein and MacLeod (2007), American Psychological Association.
The Psychopath : Emotion and the Brain by James Blair et al (2005), Blackwell.“
textbook.ch:
“Inhibition in Cognition by Gorfein and MacLeod (2007), American Psychological Association.
